parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: A deposit is initiated by making a deposit in the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID used to find address of token to be used for deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: depositor
parameterDecorators.description: Address of account making the deposit in the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of ABI-encoded arrays of tokenIDs and amounts.

functionDecorators.name: executeProposal
functionDecorators.description: Proposal execution should be initiated when a proposal is finalized in the Bridge contract. by a relayer on the deposit's destination chain.Data passed into the function should be constructed as ABI encoding of: tokenIDs uint256[] bytes amounts uint256[] bytes destinationRecipientAddress bytes bytes transferData bytes bytes.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of ABI-encoded {tokenIDs}, {amounts}, {recipient}, and {transferData} of types uint[], uint[], bytes, bytes.

parameterDecorators.name: bridgeAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of previously deployed Bridge.

functionDecorators.name: setBurnable
functionDecorators.description: First verifies {contractAddress} is whitelisted, then sets {_burnList}[{contractAddress}] to true.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be used when making or executing deposits.

functionDecorators.name: setResource
functionDecorators.description: First verifies {_resourceIDToContractAddress}[{resourceID}] and {_contractAddressToResourceID}[{contractAddress}] are not already set, then sets {_resourceIDToContractAddress} with {contractAddress}, {_contractAddressToResourceID} with {resourceID}, and {_contractWhitelist} to true for {contractAddress}.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Used to manually release ERC1155 tokens from ERC1155Safe.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of ABI-encoded {tokenAddress}, {recipient}, {tokenIDs}, {amounts}, and {transferData} of types address, address, uint[], uint[], bytes.
